column4: I have no clue how to tell people where crap is in ubuntu because there isn't just one standard interface.. people are using all kinds of different versions and unity, and gnome, and xfce.. heh.. in debian things are more consistent and I know what to tell people
yeah well in 11.10 there is no system menu even when using the gnome shell
11.10 is badly broken.. and if it were debian it wouldnt have ever released
